DefaultHeader.comment: this is the default calss for headers.   Notice that we have not changed the fontFamily, so we will use the font family front 'default' class.

DefaultNavigationBar.comment: this is the default calss for navigation bar. Notice that we have not changed the fontFamily, so we will use the font family front 'default' class.

BaseViewController.comment: This is the view controller inherited by all of the view controllers in app code. The backgroundColor is used for status bar.

DefaultBoldLabel.comment: this is the default style class.   If no class is set, or if certain attributes are left out, these options will be used.

DefaultCellSeperatorLabel.comment: This is the default seperator label in all table rows. If the height is set to 0 the seperator will not be shown.

DefaultTableViewSection.comment: This is a parent class for all the tableview section. The backgroundColor and backgroundSelectedColor will work when we use sections as tableview rows

DefaultTableRevealArrow.comment: The class to control tint of default table view reveal arrow.

BaseTableRowThumb.comment: This is parent class for all thumb icons shown in table views. backgroundColor and backgroundSelectedColor work for border. and color and selctedColor work for icon tint like in sideslider menu

DefaultLabel.comment: this is the default style class.   If no class is set, or if certain attributes are left out, these options will be used.

DefaultTableViewCell.comment: This is a parent class for all the tableview cells. The backgroundColor and backgroundSelectedColor work when we select a tableRow

SideSliderTableRevealArrow.comment: The class to control tint of side slider reveal arrow.

SideSliderSectionHeaderLabel.comment: in this class we are loading first the values from the defaultHeader class and then over-riding some of the items in this class.  In this case, we are just overriding fontColor

SideSliderMenuTableViewSection.comment: The menu sections in side slider menu. The backgroundColor and backgroundSelectedColor will work when we use sections as tableview rows

SideSliderHeaderSeperatorLabel.comment: This is seperator label in header rows for collapsable menu. If the height is set to 0 the seperator will not be shown.

SideSliderMenuTableViewCell.comment: The menu rows in side slider menu. The backgroundColor and backgroundSelectedColor will work when we select a tableRow but only if the menu is non-collapsable

SideSliderHeaderAdView.comment: This is for Side Slider Menu on top where it shows Ads

SideSliderHeaderLogoView.comment: This is for Side Slider Menu on top where it shows Logo

NotificationsCellOptionalMessageTextLabe.comment: Optional Message for any channel in Notifications

NotificationsTableViewSection.comment: This is the table section header for notifications

NotificationsSectionHeaderLabel.comment: Label for Table Section in Notifications

NavigationBarTitle.comment: this class is for navigation bar title image.

NavigationBar.comment: this class is for navigation bar.

NavigationBarButton.comment: this class is for navigation bar button.
